name: Pruning
description: Other players can cut off your wood with an axe to decrease your size.

badges.text: You can blacklist any entity preventing them from being affected by your buffs by attacking them or being attacked, you can forgive them by right clicking with an empty hand.

There are 5 stages of root progression while planted, on stage 1 you will take 60% less damage instead of 40%, on stage 2 you will give saturation to everyone nearby, on stage 3 you will be able to sense entities with your roots making them glow for you, on stage 4 you will give experience to everyone nearby, finally on stage 5 you will give regeneration to everyone nearby.
